description:
This weekend we caught Cody relaxing by the pool, stretched out on a chair, soaking up the sun rays.

After he lotions himself, Cody gets a bit frisky for our enjoyment. He pulls out that huge hog of his and slowly strokes it, making it grow and get rock hard. Any takers?

He takes a dip before drying off and continuing his self-stimulation until he gets himself off all over himself.

Enjoy!
title: Jerking off by the pool
